meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>energy</kanji> <kanji>phenomenon</kanji>. That's when energy is doing stuff in the sky and nobody understands it. That's the <vocabulary>weather</vocabulary> for you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
